original_text: When they had stopped laughing at him, they took the dark red coat off him. They put his own clothes back on him. Then they took him away to the place where they would kill him on a cross.
korean_text: 희롱을 다 한 후 자색 옷을 벗기고 도로 그의 옷을 입히고 십자가에 못 박으려고 끌고 나가니라

sentences.original_text: When they had stopped laughing at him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그를 비웃는 것을 멈췄을 때

sentences.original_text: they took the dark red coat off him
They put his own clothes back on him
to the place where they would kill him on a cross
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 십자가에 못 박혀 죽을 장소로
